imdb.plot outline: The show takes place in Moscow house, where in three-room apartment lives a young family. The main characters - a sports commentator Konstantin (head of the family), his wife Vera (housewife), their two twin-sons and five year old daughter. It seems that they live well, and life is good. But no! In the same house live Konstantin's parents, which create a lot of problems to our heroes.
imdb.title: The Voronins

But no! In the same house live Konstantin's parents, which create a lot of problems to our heroes.::Laforto
